short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension designed to enhance your browsing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
“Runner” is a dynamic browser extension that brings your web browsing experience to life. With Runner, you can inject a burst of animation into your online escapades. Imagine your favorite characters walking, flying, running, jumping, or even ascending skyward right on your screen! 

Install Runner today and turn your browser into a lively canvas where animations come alive! 🚀🌟
